body.name: ULG RGB Floor Lamp, Reading Floor Lamp 2-in-1 Corner Lamp 5%-100% Dimmable Super Bright LED Lamp, 3000K-6500K 360°Adjustable Gooseneck Floor Lamp Touch Control for Living Room, Bedroom, Office
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 11 hrs 24 mins
features: RGB Ambience Light：ULG floor lamp has one breathing light mode that smoothly changes color every 2.5 seconds, now you can experience the futuristic light atmosphere with our dynamic light. It's perfect for enhancing the mood at parties and dance sessions with its soothing color-changing light patterns.

2-in-1 Lighting: Our floor lamp incorporates dual light sources in one: the RGB breathing light and the main task light. At the back of the RGB light, the wide-angle 55-LED main light offers 1000 lumen super bright and steady light, with 3 color temperature options (3000K, 4000K, 6500K) and a 5% to 100% dimming function. A click of buttons to customize your floor light for various tasks.

Convenient to Use: Enjoy complete flexibility with the 360° adjustable gooseneck on this standing lamp to any lighting angle. With the memory function, the lamp will remember your last selected brightness for any color when the light is turned on. The intuitive control buttons and eye-protective lampshade design ensure your comfortable user experience.

Easy Installation: The ULG corner lamp could be assembled in just three simple steps: connect the lamp body, attach it to the base, and plug in the power cord. You now have a perfect gooseneck floor lamp for tasks like reading, working, dancing, or sleeping. The assembled light is 5.7ft tall, with a 6.6ft cord to plug the adapter into a nearby socket.

Modern Design for Versatile Uses: This gooseneck floor lamp is a versatile addition suitable for various settings such as the living room, bedroom, or home office. Its minimalist design and low-profile black finish blend into most home decor styles, elevating your lighting levels and modern life quality. So much light, so much delight!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Revitalize your home atmosphere with our 2024 RGB breathing Floor Light mode Intuitive Touch Control for Effortless IlluminationTailor your lighting experience to match your surroundings with our floor lamp's three selectable color temperatures (3000K, 4000K, 6500K)Lamp head comes with 180° up/down flip and 350° horizontal rotation

Efficient Brilliance: 50,000 Hours of Illumination Experience the longevity of brilliance with our floor lamp, crafted with an aluminum casing designed for more than just aesthetics. By efficiently dissipating heat at an accelerated rate, this innovative design ensures that the LEDs endure for an impressive 50,000 hours.

Stable Base The ULG floor lamp has a stable 2.9-pound base so that it free-stands and won't topple even in the event of accidental bumps from children or pets. Iron Rods 3 metal rods make up 69-inch high gooseneck floor lamp. With the power cord going through, you only need to tighten them to assemble the lamp body. 2 in 1 Lighting This 2-in-1 standing lamp has incorporated an RGB light and a task light to offer perfect lighting for various purposes, with just one light. Glare-Free Light The white frosted lampshade of this RGB corner lamp for living room ensures that the light is undazzling and eye-protective.
Energy-Saving Floor Lamp Longer Lifespan Aluminum casing dissipates heat faster so LEDs last longer.
Let's Dance Now! Immersive Movie Time! I Love You, Baby!

Versatile Reading Lamp-Working/Relaxing/Sleeping Crafted to provide soft, non-blinding light, this reading light is your ideal companion for focused work and reduced eye fatigue. Perfect for various activities like working, reading, resting, nursing, gaming, manicures, tattoos, and more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love love love
reviews.reviewText: This floor light...can't really call it a lamp cuz it is so brilliant...is fabulous. I wanted something that would be very bright for doing hand quilting and I got that and more. It has a bright light setting and four lovely ambient light settings.A breeze to assemble...and it's unobtrusive...blending in with the surroundings.Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LED Floor Lamp
reviews.reviewText: So far this lamp is the BEST one I’ve bought. The pros are: it by far succeeds in brightness, performance, quality & value for my money. (1) my last lamp, while bright, it’s highest brightness would be comparable to a 3 out of 5 with this one. (2) I also like that it has easy accessibility to buttons, which are on the pole vs the old one that has a sensor on top. It is stable & stays in place vs the old being top heavy. (3) I caught it on sale so I basically paid the same for both. I plan on buying 2 more for Christmas gifts. Right now with the holiday sales on is THE TIME TO BUY! Good luck.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not very stable
reviews.reviewText: If you want a bright lamp, this is for you! Blindingly bright really. Although you can dim it, it’s not what I call dim. It does have three color temperatures, which is nice. I like the controls on the stand part. That’s very convenient. The gooseneck part goes up and down, but not side to side. The RGB is nice, if that’s your thing. My biggest complaint is that the base is not really heavy enough to keep it from falling over if bumped. If I had it to do over, I’d buy a different style. Just my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Need a reading lamp this is a great pick
reviews.reviewText: After buying one I ended up sending it back. I search for another one and found this particular one. It has a great look, the goose nech, various color level and goose neck to position it was exactly what I needed. Well I bought it and found it was simple to coonect the pole sections and the base. Plugged it in and use the touch sensor loated on the pole to turn it on and set the level of lighhting you want.. Wow I was more that pleased with this light! Would highly reommed this fixture for those who could use a stand alone, easy to install and sensor control pole light.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works half of the time.
reviews.reviewText: I really like this lamp when it works. The problem is that sometimes it just turns itself off and quite often it simply decides not to turn on. It is hard to give a good rating when the product only works when it wants to. Edit: This seller reached out to me and was very kind in resolving my problem, so I edited my review. Thanks again!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Initially, I loved this item. Economically priced. Sleek design, ease of setup and use. Week 1 the colored lights stopped working and the red stayed on nonstop. But the biggest drawback - if you move the gooseneck back and forth at all, the pole that connects to the base becomes loose, requiring constant correction. This apparently strained the thin electrical wire and the light no longer works. So, maybe not so economical at all…..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well, wish I opted for one with remote control
reviews.reviewText: Lamp works really well, easily moved.Great light.Wish it had remote control

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars This lamp is misleading buyer beware!!!
reviews.reviewText: The lamp has an rgb function that doesn't let you pick a color and stay on it. It only cascades through the entire rainbow and you can't even slow the speed at which it does that, orcahnge the brightness!!! The only brightness control you have is over the main light (cold/neutral/warm). If you don't mind the rgb function being what it is with no options to freeze the color or dim it... The main light is what they advertise. I'd love the lamp if it hadn't have been misleading regarding the limited rgb functionality. I'm not sure if I'm going to keep it or send it back.... But I'm upset about it either way. 😢
